description:
On this episode, I discuss in detail the different methods used to make three separate miniature ruins for Dungeons & Dragons or Wargaming. 


Join us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Black-Magic-Craft-677344725740094/?ref=bookmarks

Black Magic Craft intro music by Black Magic Craft

Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
title: Project Showcase: Ruins For D&D and Tabletop Games  (Episode 014)
